cards.title: Fort 51
cards.text: React: After you invent a Gadget Weapon or Gadget dude, give 1 bounty to an opposing dude with influence equal to or less than the Gadget's printed cost. Noon, Boot: Boot your Gadget that is not at your home and remove 1 bounty from an opposing dude. Gain 1 ghost rock and you may discard a card.

cards.title: Wong Fee Lee
cards.text: While you have dudes in a shootout, Wong has +1 Kung Fu for each dude in the opposing posse (even when Wong is not in the posse).
cards.flavor: "The threat from Farnum's Consortium is bigger than my beef with Iron Dragon."

cards.title: Mr. Outang
cards.text: Noon: Call out a dude at this Saloon. Shootout: Boot a Saloon you control to give Mr. Outang +1 bullets.
cards.flavor: "That boy's go some real mad monkey kung fu! - Chuan "Jen" Qi

cards.title: Piotr
cards.text: Shootout Repeat: Discard Piotr's Miracle to give him +1 bullets and make him a stud. You may use this ability once per shootout.
cards.flavor: "It's good to feel the air again!"

cards.title: Pianogeist
cards.text: While Pianogeist is at an opponent's home, it has -1 upkeep. Noon: Move Pianogeist to the home of a player with more ghost rock than you. You may boot a dude there.

cards.title: Sterling Chan
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Target a dude at this location. If they are in the same location as Sterling this Nightfall, they do not unboot.
cards.flavor: "Hello, friends and enemies! Have you heard tell of this incredible new product?"

cards.title: Delores "Dolly" Lassiter
cards.text: Noon, Pay 1 Ghost Rock: Unboot this deed. Its abilities may be used an additional time this turn.
cards.flavor: "Claude, who is that woman who prefers Chemin de Fer over Faro?"

cards.title: Dr. Dwight Shelton
cards.text: Noon, Boot: If this location is a Ranch, search your discard pile for a non-Gadget Horse, add it to your play hand, then discard a card.
cards.flavor: "Hiring protection for the herd; only serious shootists need apply."

cards.title: Noah & Jonah Whateley
cards.text: While in a shootout at your home, Hucksters in a posse with Noah & Jonah are studs.
cards.flavor: "We never did study Hoyle, but my brother's got a few tricks of his own."

cards.title: The Grave Gunslinger
cards.text: You may play the Gunslinger from your hand (into your posse) as a Shootout play (paying all costs). He enters the shootout booted. Resolution, Boot: Put the Gunslinger into your draw hand, he becomes the suit and value of your choice. Discard a card from your draw hand.

cards.title: Gabrielle Perivale
cards.text: Shootout: Boot Gabrielle's Mystical goods to reduce an opposing dude's bullets and influence by Gabrielle's bullets and influence, respectively.
cards.flavor: "You've been such a good host."

cards.title: The Resurrectionist
cards.text: React: After the Resurrectionist enters play, shuffle an Abomination from your Boot Hill into your deck.
cards.flavor: "It's more art than science, you see, and my brush strokes are flawless."

cards.title: Jett Can Cega
cards.text: React Repeat: Before Jett leaves your posse, boot a card in the opposing posse.
cards.flavor: "Some see it as too much a break with tradition, but these fighting arts from Shanghai are exhilarating."

cards.title: Fire-Dancer
cards.text: React: After Fire-Dancer succeeds with a pull to activate a Totem, unboot him.
cards.flavor: "My ancestors are smiling down on me; can you say the same?"

cards.title: Mahpiya Violet
cards.text: Shootout: Discard a Spirit you own at this location (attached to a dude or planted here) to give Mahpiya +2 bullets and make her a stud.
cards.flavor: "Sometimes it just takes drawing on the strength around you to see things clearly and hit your target."

cards.title: "Uncle" Howard Bearclaw
cards.text: Noon: Move Uncle to an Out of Town location.
cards.flavor: "He knows these hills like the back of his hand." - Sifting Squirrel

cards.title: Rafi Hamid
cards.text: Noon: Move Rafi to a Government location. React: After a dude in the opposing posse is aced, Rafi gets a permanent +1 bullets.

cards.title: Iris Jarvis
cards.text: Resolution: Boot an opposing wanted dude. If your opponent has a cheatin' hand, you may boot an opposing card.
cards.flavor: "My mama says I got some sass in my frass."

cards.title: Nat Wright
cards.text: Noon: Boot Nat's Melee Weapon to call out a wanted dude at this location.
cards.flavor: "He killed 13 men in the shootout at the Lucky Lab Saloon." - Len Nuanez

cards.title: Petunia Mallard
cards.text: While in a shootout, Petunia gets a bonus to influence equal to the highest bullets among dudes in her posse.
cards.flavor: "Reggie and I have been in worse situations, haven't we darlin'?"

cards.title: Mateo Suarez
cards.text: React: After Mateo gains bounty, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "Can't say I care for Farnum's dream, but I do like his money."

cards.title: Abigail Lloyd
cards.text: Resolution: If you revealed a cheatin' hand, discard a goods or spell in the opposing posse.
cards.flavor: "Which of you sidewinders took a share out of my saddle?" - Felix Cutler

cards.title: Harry Highbinder
cards.text:
Harry may not have attached goods.

While Harry is in town square, town square can be controlled by players and is worth 1 control point.
cards.flavor: "Town square's a place of the people.  And I'm one of the people, claiming this place."

cards.title: Len Nuanez
cards.text: React: After Len successfully invents a Gadget Weapon, attach it to a nearby dude (ignoring control of the location and the dude being booted). React: After Len successfully invents an Experimental Gadget, unboot him.

cards.title: Tsurugi
cards.text: While Tsurugi has a Melee Weapon, he gets +2 bullets.
cards.flavor: "Ever since he saw Kang's samurai he wanted to be like them, but at the end of the day he's just a hired thug with a sword." - Randall

cards.title: Blind Mary
cards.text: While Mary has a Gadget Sidekick, she is a stud. Shootout: Boot a Gadget attached to Mary to give her +1 bullets.
cards.flavor: "How long you think it takes my pets to destroy your saloon, mister?"

cards.title: Calamity Jane
cards.text: Shootout Repeat: Discard a ♣ to give an opposing dude -2 bullets. You may use this ability once per shootout.
cards.flavor: "Wild Bill Hickok didn't die the first time, mister. You can put that in the bank."

cards.title: Doris Powell
cards.text:
At the end of the turn, or if Doris is ever at home, she loses all control points.

Whenever Doris moves to an in-town deed without booting, she  gains a control point, to a maximum of 3.

cards.title: Red Tears
cards.text: React: After a Totem is planted at this location, gain 1 ghost rock.
cards.flavor: "Each incident stokes the flames a little more. Soon the pot of hatred will boil over and wash this town from the land."

cards.title: Empire Bakery
cards.text: React, Boot: During the Upkeep phase, one of your dudes at this deed gets -1 upkeep.
cards.flavor: "You keep cookin' like that and we'll have a fire bigger than Satan's garden." - Seamus O'Toole

cards.title: Bai Long Tea Shop
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Move a zero influence dude from an adjacent location to this deed.
cards.flavor: "From their back rooms Huang Li secretly extends Iron Dragon's grip over Chinatown." - Al Swearengen

cards.title: Dr. Babcock's Office
cards.text: React, Boot: When discarding (not acing) a dude to cover casualties, place them in your hand instead (only applies to one dude if multiple dudes are being discarded).
cards.flavor: "This has nothing to do with demons, Mr. Bullock. Leave the demons to God and trust the pain to me."

cards.title: Scout's Rest Ranch
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Move your dude with a Horse home (from any location).
cards.flavor: "A sanctuary for the Twilight Legion to rest their horses." - Lacy O'Malley

cards.title: Langrishe Theater
cards.text: Abominations at this location have -1 bullets.
cards.flavor: "Only place I know with dancing girls and a Bible reading on the same bill." - Deadwood Dick

cards.title: Iron Dragon Regional Office
cards.text: After the Gamblin' phase, this deed's controller discards a card at random.
cards.flavor: "Yuan Min oversees our official operations with admirable efficiency." - Huang Li

cards.title: Wong's Bazaar
cards.text: Cheatin' Resolution, Boot: Take 1 ghost rock from the cheatin' player or draw a card.
cards.flavor: "Today's gonna be my lucky day." - Rob Wilby

cards.title: Sunday Best
cards.text: This dude gets +3 influence during the Production phase. React, Boot: At the start of the Production phase, move this dude to an adjacent location (without booting).

cards.title: Guandao
cards.text: If this dude has Kung Fu, they become a stud. Shootout, Boot: This dude gets +1 bullets.
cards.flavor: "An elegant weapon for an uncivilized town." - Wong Fee Lee

cards.title: Steel Swarm
cards.text: Cheatin' Resolution, Boot: The cheatin' player must boot one of their dudes. If this is a shootout, reduce your casualties by 2 this round and boot an opposing dude.

cards.title: Log-o-Matic
cards.text: Shootout, Boot: If this isn't the first round of the shootout, your opponent takes an extra casualty this round.
cards.flavor: "A less elegant weapon, made by a more civilized mind." - Adelaide Rose

cards.title: Penny Farthing
cards.text: This dude gets +1 influence while in town square. Noon, Boot: Discard a card to move this dude to an adjacent location.
cards.flavor: "Well ain't you a highfalutin." - Aunt Lou Marchbanks

cards.title: Negentropic Pylon
cards.text:
Negentropic Pylon is worth 1 control point while at an opponent's home.

At Sundown, pull. If the pull is ♣, discard this card.
cards.flavor: "This gizmo helps us by killing the land? Should we really be doing this?" - Roger Wilcox

cards.title: The Royals' Hoyle
cards.text: Cheatin' Resolution, Boot: The cheatin' player discards a card from their play hand. If this is a shootout, reduce your casualties by 1. If this dude is a Huckster, draw a card.

cards.title: Dingler's Dirigible
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Target another location. Move any number of your dudes from this location to there. If the pull is ♣, boot all of your dudes that moved.
cards.flavor: "What? It's perfectly safe! Ghost rock fumes are nothin'" - Arthur Dingler

cards.title: Clear Out!
cards.text: Noon Hex X, Boot: Target an opposing dude at this location. X is that dude's grit. If successful, send them home. If successful by 6 or more, boot them.
cards.flavor: "And take your uncivilized stench with you!" - Felix Cutler

cards.title: Alone in the Dark
cards.text: Shootout Hex X, Boot: Target an opposing dude. X is that dude's grit. If successful, that dude does not contribute to draw hands and cannot be chosen as a casualty this round. If all dudes in a posse are ever affected by Alone in the Dark, cancel the effect on each of those dudes.

cards.title: Chastise
cards.text: Noon Miracle 9, Boot: A wanted dude at a nearby location gets -1 influence and -1 bullets.
cards.flavor: "Your sins will catch up with you, even in a godless  town such as this." - Amity Hopkins

cards.title: Strength of Fellowship
cards.text: Shootout Miracle 8, Boot: Boot any number of dudes in your posse to make them studs.
cards.flavor: "That's not the Bill you knew. Stay behind us, Swearengen. The light of the Lord will match his firepower." - Bass Reeves

cards.title: Vengeful Pack
cards.text: Resolution Spirit 5, Boot: If this Sidekick is discarded to cover casualties this round, a 2-stud Gunslinger token joins your posse.
cards.flavor: "Our pack fought with you in the Stone Forest, and will in Deadwood." - Yiska

cards.title: Bones of the Earth
cards.text: Dudes may not be sent home from shootouts at this location. Shootout Spirit 6, Boot: All non-Shaman dudes in this shootout get -1 bullets.
cards.flavor: "The bones guard our kiva in this world and the hunting grounds." - Tsintah

cards.title: Inner Struggle
cards.text: While this card is booted, reduce your shootout hand rank by 1. If you reveal a cheatin' hand during a shootout and the owner of this card has a legal hand, boot this card. Cheatin' Resolution: Attach this card to the cheatin' player's home, booted. That player discards one random card from their play hand.

cards.title: Hickok's Revenge
cards.text: Resolution: A 2-stud Gunslinger token enters play and joins your posse. If the opponent's hand is a Dead Man's Hand, reduce the cost of this card by 2, reduce your casualties by 3 this round, and give the Gunslinger +2 bullets.

cards.title: On the Lam
cards.text: Noon: Increase the bounty of a dude by 1. The dude's controller may move them to another location.
cards.flavor: "Best get out of town, Jack. I'll give you enough supplies to get ya somewhere else." - Al Swearengen

cards.title: My Horse Don't Like Ya, Either
cards.text: Noon: Boot your dude's Horse to have that dude call out a dude at their location with lower value than the Horse.
cards.flavor: "And she's wanted in 12 counties!" - Curly Bill Brocius

cards.title: I'll Cover Yer Backs!
cards.text: Resolution: Boot your target dude to send up to two of your dudes home booted. You may unboot one of the sent home dudes with grit lower than the target's.
cards.flavor: "I've got this!" - Nathan Shane

cards.title: Unexpected Allies
cards.text: Cheatin' Resolution: Choose a dude from your discard pile and add that dude to your play hand. If this is a shootout, you may have that dude join your posse (paying all costs) to increase your hand rank by 2.
cards.flavor: "Nothing like the whispers of war to bring a posse together." - Eagle Woman

cards.title: Facing Yer Demons
cards.text: Noon: Target your dude with no attached cards. Give them +2 bullets. When the target calls out a dude, the mark's controller must discard a card as an additional cost to refuse the callout. (These effects still apply even if the target attaches cards later this turn.)

cards.title: STAMPEDE!
cards.text: Noon Job, Boot: Mark the town square. If successful, boot all dudes in town square, and it is not considered adjacent to in-town locations this turn.
cards.flavor: "RUUUNNNNNN!!!!!" - Dr. Dwight Shelton

cards.title: Against the Odds
cards.text: Shootout: You get +1 hand rank this round if the opposing posse has more dudes than your posse when draw hands are revealed.
cards.flavor: "Dozens of Farnum's men, you say? Best to tell him to get a dozen more!" - Buzz Crover

cards.title: Stand Together
cards.text: Shootout: Target your unbooted dude in the shootout to unboot a number of your dudes equal to the target dude's influence.
cards.flavor: "War has devastated these lands too many times. We will not let it happen again." - SuAnne Bettelyoun
